name: Magnesium sulfide
desc: Magnesium sulfide is an inorganic compound with the formula MgS. It is a white crystalline material but often is encountered in an impure form that is brown and non-crystalline powder. It is generated industrially in the production of metallic iron.
Other cations:
Calcium sulfide
Strontium sulfide
Barium sulfide
